bjorna.name: bjorna giantsdottir
bjorna.description: Female Orc Barbarian – 7’ – Warrior of the Hill Tribe

abilities.rage: Once per game, a great burst of strength allows Bjorna to slay all enemies or overcome an obstacle.
abilities.fortitude: Once per game, If Bjorna is dropped to ‘unconscious’ she returns to life at ‘heavy wound’.

magical-item.horn-of-gallerburn: Once per game, Bjorna can blow her horn and summon the spirits of her tribe’s elders. They will perform one action: help in combat, offer advice, or heal the party.

jayna.name: lady jayna falchion
jayna.description: Female Human Knight – 5’10’’ – Champion of His Majesty

abilities.purify: Once per game, Jayna can lay on hands to cure disease, purify water, consecrate defiled land, drive out demons and spirits from their hosts.
abilities.heal: Once per game, Jayna can restore an ally to full health.

magical-item.cutbert: The holy weapon can detect good and evil, find the presence of magic and cast a bright searching light

zazzerpan.name: zazzerpan the scatter brained
zazzerpan.description: Male Human Wizard – 5’6’’ – Master of the Mind-Boggling Arts

abilities.fireball: Upon the bellowing of the magic word Zazzerpan casts a fiery ball of destruction.
abilities.ice: Upon the bellowing of his OTHER magic word, Zazzerpan casts a haze of ice. It does no damage, but can hold enemies in place, freeze traps, create walls and treacherous surfaces.

magical-item.grimoire d'gruesome: A living book of spells, once per session Zazzerpan can look through the book (it tickles, btw) to find the perfect spell for the situation he finds himself in.

yolo.name: yolo swaggins
yolo.description: Male Halfling Thief – 3’2’’ – Small Reward Offered For His Capture

abilities.dodge: Once per session Yolo can dodge out of the way of any attack or any trap, getting away without any damage.
abilities.fast-hands: Yolo can attempt to steal without detection or attempt to disable any trap or any other sleight of hand.

magical-item.fidgetywib: A ticking, whirring clockwork beetle that can, once a day, disable any trap or unlock any door.
